name: Universe Survivors
description:
universe survivors is a roguelike spaceship game. Inspired by spaceship shooting games from retro consoles. Get powerups, upgrades, coins and destroy the bosses of the universe in this jam packed bullet hell spaceship shooter!
Features
-unlock abilitys like the wing man ability, or the bullet box ability
-use your coins to reduce your cooldown or fire rate.
-a couple of different bosses for variety.
